Mikayla Simon â€œMe and Jada have been best friends since we were younger and Iâ€™d do anything to make her happy,â€ Mikayla told BuzzFeed News. 
â€œWeâ€™re basically sisters,â€ Jada echoed.
On Saturday night, the two friends had a sleepover. 
â€œI thought my boyfriend was out with another girl,â€ Jada said. â€œSo I came up with the idea of [Mikayla] dressing up as a boyâ€”so that it looks like I had another boy in the room with me.â€
